questions.question: What does a red traffic signal light mean?
questions.explanation: A red light requires drivers to make a complete stop.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers of potential hazards.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way when two cars arrive at an intersection not controlled by signs or signals at the same time?
questions.explanation: At an uncontrolled intersection, the car on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in school zones in Tennessee?
questions.explanation: The speed limit in school zones in Tennessee is 15 mph.

questions.question: When parallel parking, how far should your car be from the curb?
questions.explanation: When parallel parking in Tennessee, your car should be no more than 18 inches from the curb.

questions.question: In heavy fog, you should use...
questions.explanation: In heavy fog, use your low beam headlights to increase visibility.
